tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE power_grid_performance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    power_consumed DECIMAL,
    latency FLOAT
)
CREATE TABLE PowerPlants ( plant_id INT PRIMARY KEY, plant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, capacity FLOAT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE Transformers ( transformer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transformer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, capacity FLOAT NOT NULL, power_plant_id INT REFERENCES PowerPlants(plant_id) );
CREATE TABLE GridLines ( line_id INT PRIMARY KEY, line_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, length FLOAT NOT NULL, power_capacity FLOAT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE GridOutages ( outage_id INT PRIMARY KEY, outage_date DATE NOT NULL, duration INT NOT NULL, affected_area VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, line_id INT REFERENCES GridLines(line_id) );

CREATE TABLE power_plants (
    plant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE substations (
    substation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    substation_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    power_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE transmission_lines (
    line_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    line_name VARCHAR(255),
    length FLOAT,
    status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE grid_outages (
    outage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    outage_start TIMESTAMP,
    outage_end TIMESTAMP,
    affected_area VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring_data (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    voltage FLOAT,
    current FLOAT,
    status BOOLEAN
)
